Class MemorySimulatorBase

java.lang.Object
  MemorySimulatorBase
Direct Known Subclasses:
BestFitMemorySimulator, FirstFitMemorySimulator, NextFitMemorySimulator, NonContiguousMemorySimulator, WorstFitMemorySimulator
public abstract class MemorySimulatorBase
extends java.lang.Object

Starter code for a memory simulator. Simulator strategies extend this abstract class.

Method Detail

getNextSlot

protected abstract int getNextSlot(int slotSize)
Return the index of the first position of the next available slot in memory Different memory strategy classes must override this abstract method.

Parameters:
slotSize - The size of the requested slot
Returns:
The index of the first position of an available requested block

timeStep

public void timeStep()
Move the simulator one virtual time step into the future, handling processes leaving and entering the system. NOTE: Not used now that the project specifications have changed.

timeStepUntil

public void timeStepUntil(int t)
Move the simulator into the future

Parameters:
t - The time to which to move the simulator
